Interface::IGenericScene

Interface::IGenericScene Class Reference

IGenericScene is an interface for providing generic scene related functionality. Any objects that modify scene information are required to implement this class. More...

Detailed Description

IGenericScene is an interface for providing generic scene related functionality. Any objects that modify scene information are required to implement this class.

Member Function Documentation

void *  pUserData
